summary: Core logo-path centralization and resilient logo rendering were implemented via a new BrandLogo component, updates to header/footer/home hero, updates to LogoMotif fallback handling, and corrected OG/Twitter + favicon references in frontend/index.html. However, the diff summary does not show the actual static image files being added/ensured under publicly served assets, and several unrequested broad styling/content changes appear to have been made.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the referenced logo asset exists in the frontend static assets (publicly served) and all logo references point to the correct, existing filename/path (centralized in frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts).
missing_requirements.reason: The code now references '/assets/generated/taste-tales-logo.dim_512x512.png', but the diff summary does not show any static asset files being added/updated under a public/static directory (e.g., frontend/public/assets/generated/...). From the provided diff evidence alone, existence of the logo file cannot be verified.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new 'hero' generated asset path (BRAND_ASSETS.hero) and updated HomePage to render a hero background image from it.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to fix logo rendering and meta image references; it did not request introducing a new hero background asset reference.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad redesign/theme changes (global CSS palette, Tailwind config extensions, multiple page content rewrites and new UI behaviors like gallery lightbox/dialog).
hallucinated_features.reason: These changes go beyond fixing missing logo rendering and meta image references; the request explicitly lists non-goals like changing information architecture and does not ask for a site-wide redesign.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/index.css, frontend/tailwind.config.js, frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx, frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx, frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx, frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx, frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx)

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded a dynamic Seo helper component that updates OG tags per route.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 specifically targets frontend/index.html meta references; adding a route-level SEO system is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty placeholder React Query hooks file (useQueries.ts).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; also the BuildRequest notes keeping backend unchanged and solving via static assets/references.
